channel.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 172
item.description: Architect, Developer, MVP - Beau Cameron (DMI), joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss transitioning from SharePoint on-prem to SPO, living in mountain isolation, why use SPFx plus latest 16 articles/videos from Microsoft/Community this week.

Architect, Developer, MVP - Beau Cameron (DMI), joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss transitioning from SharePoint on-prem to SPO, living in mountain isolation, why use SPFx plus latest 16 articles/videos from Microsoft/Community this week.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: A collection of resources for Microsoft 365 developers
item.description: Being a Microsoft 365 developer can mean a lot of things.
Being a Microsoft 365 developer can mean a lot of things.
item.dc:creator: Eli Schei

item.title: Easily Automate a Table in SQL Server Management Studio with Power Automate
item.description: This Step in this blog shows you how to Update a row in Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio from the response of a Microsoft Forms Using Power Automate.
This Step in this blog shows you how to Update a row in Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio from the response of a Microsoft Forms Using Power Automate.

item.title: We love community
item.description: Community rocks Our goal in the Microsoft 365 platform community (PnP) is to help everyone to extend Microsoft 365 and we offer free support as in

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 23rd of June, 2022
item.description: Demos - List Formatting - Tab and Percentage Chart, Tracking activities with Microsoft Lists and Power Automate, and Building your own Microsoft Teams using Microsoft Graph Toolkit and .NET Core API + Integrate using Web Components. Yo teams version releases + 9 scripts.

Demos - List Formatting - Tab and Percentage Chart, Tracking activities with Microsoft Lists and Power Automate, and Building your own Microsoft Teams using Microsoft Graph Toolkit and .NET Core API + Integrate using Web Components. Yo teams version releases + 9 scripts.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: CLI for Microsoft 365 v5.4
item.description: We’ve just published a new major version of the CLI for Microsoft 365 with new commands for working with and managing Microsoft 365 and SharePoint Framework projects on any platform.
We’ve just published a new major version of the CLI for Microsoft 365 with new commands for working with and managing Microsoft 365 and SharePoint Framework projects on any platform.
item.dc:creator: Adam Wójcik

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 21st of June, 2022
item.description: Two demos - Using the Microsoft Graph PowerShell SDK for common operations and Get started with UI Library for Azure Communication Services. Delivered 8 new articles/documents this week. Introduced Microsoft Community Initiative to build a unified Microsoft Cloud Community.

Two demos - Using the Microsoft Graph PowerShell SDK for common operations and Get started with UI Library for Azure Communication Services. Delivered 8 new articles/documents this week. Introduced Microsoft Community Initiative to build a unified Microsoft Cloud Community.

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 171
item.description: Teams/Power Apps Consultant, MVP - Edyta Gorzon (Valo Solutions), joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss technology adoption, vision re-engineering, tips for anyone curious about a career in technology plus latest 24 articles/videos from Microsoft/Community this week.

Teams/Power Apps Consultant, MVP - Edyta Gorzon (Valo Solutions), joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss technology adoption, vision re-engineering, tips for anyone curious about a career in technology plus latest 24 articles/videos from Microsoft/Community this week.

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 16th of June, 2022
item.description: Demos: Building a safer custom Content Editor Web Part with SPFx, Getting started on using GitHub Codespaces with your SharePoint Framework solutions, MyShifts – SharePoint Framework Viva Connections - Adaptive Card Extension. Project releases for PnPjs, CLI, Search + 4 samples.

Demos: Building a safer custom Content Editor Web Part with SPFx, Getting started on using GitHub Codespaces with your SharePoint Framework solutions, MyShifts – SharePoint Framework Viva Connections - Adaptive Card Extension. Project releases for PnPjs, CLI, Search + 4 samples.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Power Platform Community Call – June 2022
item.description: Latest Power Platform related news and events. Welcome Hugo Bernier - Community Program Manager for Power Pages. Two brilliant demos delivered – Taking your Power Apps mobile navigation UI to the next level! And Power to the Pages – Introduction to Power Pages!

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 14th of June, 2022
item.description: Three demos - Latest on deprecating basic auth for Exchange, Introduction to Microsoft Graph .Net SDK v5, and Introduction to Microsoft Graph Postman collection. Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) - June 2022 update and 8 new documents/articles released.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) - June 2022 update
item.description: Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) June 2022 update is out with a summary of the latest guidance, samples, and solutions from Microsoft or from the community for the community.

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 170
item.description: SharePoint developer - Marcin Wojciechowski (Valo Solutions), joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss quality assurance, risk management, development tools, news sources, tips to new developers plus latest 24 articles/tweets/videos from Microsoft/Community this week.

item.title: Office Add-ins community call – June 8, 2022
item.description: Microsoft roadmap for One Outlook, Outlook Smart Alerts (Demo), Using Blazor in an Excel add-in. Q&A in chat and at end of call.

item.title: Adaptive Cards community call – June 2022
item.description: New Teams Toolkit v4.0 features enable developers and non-developers to create Teams apps with minimal work. New features called out are used in a scenario-based Teams timer trigger app that delivers Adaptive Card notifications in Teams. 20 minute Q&A.

New Teams Toolkit v4.0 features enable developers and non-developers to create Teams apps with minimal work. New features called out are used in a scenario-based Teams timer trigger app that delivers Adaptive Card notifications in Teams. 20 minute Q&A.
item.dc:creator: J.P. Roca

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 9th of June, 2022
item.description: Demos - Independent Publishing Connectors Sessionize Demo, List Formatting - Payment Registration, and Understanding Sites.Selected permissions in SharePoint Online. Yo teams version preview releases, 5 Independent Publisher Connectors, 9 scripts and 1Teams sample. Power Platform Samples Contributor training announced.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 7th of June, 2022
item.description: Three demos - Migrate your SharePoint workflows to Power Automate with migration tooling (preview), TeamsJS SDK V2 to extend your Microsoft Teams solutions to Outlook and Office, and Send a SMS message with Azure Communication Services. New articles, updated samples.

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 169
item.description: Microsoft 365 Solution Architect - Yannick Reekmans (Qubix), joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss how customers, partners and IT can approach Power Platform, staying current, building business, Microsoft support, plus latest 14 articles/videos from Microsoft/Community this week.

Microsoft 365 Solution Architect - Yannick Reekmans (Qubix), joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss how customers, partners and IT can approach Power Platform, staying current, building business, Microsoft support, plus latest 14 articles/videos from Microsoft/Community this week.
